rev.diff:
Line 158: Line 158:
*'''Convoy feat. Nike Free 7.0 Ultra Magnus''' (2007)
*'''Convoy feat. Nike Free 7.0 Ultra Magnus''' (2007)
:A special repaint of the Optimus Prime from the "Transformers: Sports Label" series in Ultra Magnus' colors was released. However it was still packaged under the name Convoy, and is therefore still identified as a version of Optimus Prime.
:A special repaint of the Optimus Prime from the "Transformers: Sports Label" series in Ultra Magnus' colors was released. However it was still packaged under the name Convoy, and is therefore still identified as a version of Optimus Prime.
  +   +
*'''''Parallax'' TFX-01 City Commander''' (2008)
  +
:An unlicensed add-on set for ''Classics'' Ultra Magnus made by the company FansProject, this is a blue trailer that transforms into an armor suit that strongly resembles Ultra Magnus' ''Generation 1'' incarnation. Also includes a huge block-shaped gun for him to hold.
  +
:The mold for this trailer was also used in various redecos for different variations of the ''Classics'' Optimus Prime figure.
  +   +
*'''''Parallax'' TFX-03 City Commander Add-On Set''' (2009)
  +
:An upgrade kit for the FansProject City Commander trailer. The kit includes a gun and two missile launchers, which closely resemble those of the original G1 Ultra Magnus toy. Also included are three interchangeable face plates.
  +   +
*'''iGear Wreckers Leader Package''' (2009)
  +
:An unofficial add-on set for the FansProject City Commander by iGear. The package includes a Magnus Hammer with three different handles (for Magnus to wield it either as a single unit or two smaller hammers), a green flag, a blue sword, a blaster rifle and a more accurate sculpt of Magnus' head.
*'''''Alternity'' Ultra Magnus Featuring Nissan GT-R''' (2010)
*'''''Alternity'' Ultra Magnus Featuring Nissan GT-R''' (2010)
Line 164: Line 174:
*'''''Generation 1'' Kabaya Gum 25th Anniversary Ultra Magnus''' (2010)
*'''''Generation 1'' Kabaya Gum 25th Anniversary Ultra Magnus''' (2010)
:The 25th anniversary gum toy is not a reissue of the original 1985 toy; instead, it appears to be based on the ''Titanium'' design.
:The 25th anniversary gum toy is not a reissue of the original 1985 toy; instead, it appears to be based on the ''Titanium'' design.
  +   +
*'''iGear PP01U Ultra Leader''' (not yet released)
  +
:An unlicensed remold of ''Masterpiece'' Ultra Magnus in a smaller size (roughly Voyager size in truck mode and Leader size in robot mode). Comes with the same accessories as iGear's PP01 Faith Leader figure, but with an extra head painted in Optimus Prime's colors.
==Transformers: Robots in Disguise==
==Transformers: Robots in Disguise==
